name: Dungeon Dick
description:
Dungeon Dick is a fantasy adventure where you must discover the wicked plot to destroy the lands . 'Fling' at your foes and land that perfect hit or miss and get punished! Highly addictive play and gorgeous sound and graphics make this an instant classic.

- unique blend of strategy and skill in a rogue-like adventure
- sweet 3-d rendered graphics
- original story and soundtrack
- fun 'flick' swipe to attack enemies
- random generated dungeons for unique games every game
- level unlock checkpoints to save your progress
- increase your abilities, grow stronger, and cast powerful spells
- huge levels with a nifty automap showing quest locations
- funny and fresh story and characters keep you engaged and entertained throughout
